name: iPuppet presents: Colin's Classic Cards
overview: iPuppet presents: Colin's Classic Cards includes four popular card games (Hearts, Spades, Euchre and Pitch) and utilizes interchangeable characters using Freeverse’s proprietary iPuppet technology. The games include a tutorial mode for beginners learning how to play. Unlike most other computer card games, this one features a 3-D environment, which the player clicks on a card and passes it over to another player with a realistic effect to the cards which is different in visual styling than in a plain 2-D environment, and includes an online community by Aspyr that other players can participate over the internet. As of 2016, the multiplayer service is no longer available. The game can be fully customized by choosing different rooms, levels, and characters.
